name: scale-test-evals
description: PromptFoo quality evaluations for Overmind risk analysis

scripts.test:shared_sg_open: promptfoo eval --var 'scenario=shared_sg_open' --var 'risk_count=2' --var 'high_risk_count=1' --var 'risks_json=[{"title":"SSH Port Open to Internet","description":"Security group allows SSH from 0.0.0.0/0","severity":"critical"}]' --filter-pattern shared_sg_open --no-cache
scripts.test:lambda_timeout: promptfoo eval --var 'scenario=lambda_timeout' --var 'risk_count=1' --var 'high_risk_count=0' --var 'risks_json=[{"title":"Lambda Timeout Too Short","description":"Lambda timeout reduced to 1 second","severity":"medium"}]' --filter-pattern lambda_timeout --no-cache
